property.name: dfs.system.level.lock.enabled
property.description: Enables or disables system level lock.

property.name: dfs.row.level.lock.enabled
property.description: Enables or disables row level lock on the storage.

property.name: dfs.storage.type
property.description: storage type could be one of derby-net, derby-em, clusterj or ...

property.name: dfs.storage.derby.protocol
property.description: "jdbc:derby:memory:derbyDB" for embedded in-memory or "jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/memory:derbyDB" for network server in-memory
